txt.en:
You have gathered a perfect cut of boar-meat, which brings to mind a tale of woe you overheard from a bard:

'Poor Parr Chopley has left all he has known and struck forth into the world, finding himself in Evendim, in Ost Forod.

'The sad little hobbit has been searching high and low for a little piece of boar to remind him of home.'

Perhaps you should travel north to Ost Forod and seek out this hobbit. He may appreciate this prize piece of boar-meat.

'Oh me, oh my, what do you have there?

'Could that possibly be a little cut of boar-meat found within the confines of Evendim. 

'Thank you so much, I will go and cook it at once.'
A Little Piece of Home in Evendim
This piece of boar-meat, while slightly discoloured, seems to be a wonderful cut of meat. Perhaps someone in Ost Forod might be really looking for something to hit the spot.
Deliver the boar-meat to Parr Chopley in Ost Forod
Parr Chopley is in Ost Forod in Evendim, far to the north of the Shire.\n\nYou should bring the boar-meat to Parr Chopley.
